hero_description: I'm a Junior full-stack developer with experience in Django and React.
contact_description: Feel free to reach out to me using the form below.
name: Name
about_me_1: I'm Jose Molina, a web developer with solid experience in React and Django, along with proficiency in other core web technologies. I specialize in creating clean, accessible, and scalable digital solutions that combine visual polish with technical efficiency. I enjoy transforming ideas into user-centered applications.   I hold a degree in Administrative Informatics and I'm currently pursuing a Master’s in Software Engineering with a focus on Artificial Intelligence. My work is driven by curiosity, continuous learning, and the desire to solve real-world problems through code.
about_story_1: After a spinal cord injury, many doors seemed to close.
about_story_2: But programming became a new path—one where, even if I can't walk, I can keep growing.
about_story_3: Through code, I’ve discovered a way to express myself, build solutions, and connect with others.
about_story_4: Technology gave me back a sense of independence, purpose, and creativity.
about_story_5: Each line of code I write is a reminder that limits are often just new starting points.
about_story_6: Being a developer has allowed me to turn challenges into opportunities.
about_story_7: I believe technology should be inclusive, because everyone deserves tools that empower.
about_story_8: My goal is to build digital experiences that are not only functional, but meaningful.
about_story_9: Even from a wheelchair, I can reach the world—one project at a time.
mission_content: Build scalable, user-centered web solutions that address real needs and generate meaningful value.
vission_content: Become a standout developer in Latin America, contributing innovative and socially impactful tech projects.
